```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lme4)
library(ordinal)
```

```{r}
data <- read.csv('results3.csv')
model <- glmer(count ~ type + (1|partecipant) + (1|trial), data = data, family = poisson())
summary(model)
```
```{r}
modelInteraction <- glmer(count ~ type *trial+ (1|partecipant) + (1|trial), data = data, family = poisson())

summary(modelInteraction)
```
```{r}
modelInteraction <- glmer(count ~ trial+ (1|partecipant) + (1|trial), data = data, family = poisson())

summary(modelInteraction)
```

```{r}
modelInteraction <- glmer(count ~ type *partecipant+ (1|partecipant) + (1|trial), data = data, family = poisson())

summary(modelInteraction)
```

```{r}
modelInteraction <- clmm(as.factor(understood) ~ type+ (1|partecipant) + (1|trial), data = data)

summary(modelInteraction)
```
```{r}
modelInteraction <- clmm(as.factor(stuck) ~ type+ (1|partecipant) + (1|trial), data = data)

summary(modelInteraction)
```
